Open House and Open Event registration

Thank you for taking the time to connect with our team. We will follow up on your form completion as soon as possible, and we welcome any further questions you may have. At Halcyon London International School, we value our relationship with every staff member, student, and parent/guardian: this is at the core of our provision of an exceptional education.

Learn more about your Open Event

At our Open Houses, you will have the opportunity to gain an insight into the daily life of our students at Halcyon. A tour (virtual or on-campus) will take you through our learning spaces and facilities.

Our Director will take you through a presentation on the IB curriculum, student life, further enrichment, and more. You will have the opportunity to read and take away documentation on our curriculum and our results, and we look forward to sharing our alumni success stories with you throughout the event.

Your child may have already studied an International Baccalaureate curriculum, or you may be new to the IB: this session will include an overview of the nature of a top IB school, the IB mission, and the certificate that students receive at the end of the Diploma Programme. We will also share some more information on the subjects available at Halcyon, as well as an insight into student life: Extra-Curriculars, Explorations, our Student Council, and more.

Our student ambassadors will be present to answer any questions you may have on what it is like to learn at Halcyon, and our Director and Admissions Director will be able to provide further information that you may seek.

Other visit options

Read more about visiting Halcyon: our private tours, Taster Evenings, and Open Houses. We encourage you to contact our Admissions Director, Maria Rosengren, with any questions you may have. We work on a rolling admissions basis, and offer Open Events throughout the year in order to provide you with a variety of opportunities to explore our school.
